abstract: Fox ranked first in the ratings on Wednesday as a two-hour installment of “So You Think You Can Dance” drew an average of 9.3 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: Fox ranked first in the ratings on Wednesday as a two-hour installment of “So You Think You Can Dance” drew an average of 9.3 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates.
